The seals contain her memories , where she laments at giving the elves their long lifespans, due to the unintended effect of binding them to her.

SMW Subobject for Memory of SerenNPC location: Grand LibraryUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 8776, 8777, 8778, 8779, 8780, 8781, 8782, 8783, 8784Examine: A memory left behind by the crystalline goddess of the elves.Release date: 25 July 2019Image: File:Memory of Seren.pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Memory of Seren

The Memory of Seren is an entity who appears upon inspecting the broken seals of the Elven Clans, and the guardian of the knowledge Seren left behind. The seals contain her memories , where she laments at giving the elves their long lifespans, due to the unintended effect of binding them to her.

The memory will also speak inside the player's head at the memoriam device in the Tower of Voices once they have retrieved all the memoriam crystals.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.
Transcripts Memory of Seren speaks in:
  • Transcript of Song of the Elves

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When the Memory first appears, it has the name of Seren, and the examine stating "The crystalline goddess of the elves." However, it reveals itself to the player to be just a fragment of her memories.
  • The Seal of the Forgotten is dedicated to the 9th Elven Clan, the Cywir, who chose to remain on the Elven homeworld of Tarddiad.
  • The Memoriam dialogue describes Mah, the Elder God who created both Seren and Zaros, along with creatures like the Mahjarrat and Muspah.

[[File:Memory of Seren chathead.png|left]]
The '''Memory of Seren''' is an entity who appears upon inspecting the broken seals of the [[Elven Clans]], and the guardian of the knowledge [[Seren]] left behind. The seals contain her memories , where she laments at giving the elves their long lifespans, due to the unintended effect of binding them to her.

The memory will also speak inside the player's head at the [[memoriam device]] in the [[Tower of Voices]] once they have retrieved all the [[memoriam crystal]]s.

==Dialogue==
{{Hastranscript|npc}}

==Trivia==
*When the Memory first appears, it has the name of '''Seren''', and the examine stating ''"The crystalline goddess of the elves."'' However, it reveals itself to the player to be just a fragment of her memories.
*The Seal of the Forgotten is dedicated to the 9th Elven Clan, the {{RSL|Cywir}}, who chose to remain on the Elven homeworld of [[Tarddiad]].
*The Memoriam dialogue describes [[Mah]], the Elder God who created both [[Seren]] and [[Zaros]], along with creatures like the [[Mahjarrat]] and {{RSL|Muspah}}.

{{Song of the Elves}}
